item.title: Online FoxPro Users Group Meeting – Tuesday, December 17th
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
UPDATE: The meeting was recorded and is available on the OFUG YouTube Channel.  OFUG (Online Visual FoxPro Users Group) meets Tuesday, December 17th, at 8:30PM (EST). If you’re not sure what time that is in your time zone, you can find it here. Doug Hennig will present “Unit Testing”, which I believe he recently presented at German DevCon. I know many […]

The post Online FoxPro Users Group Meeting – Tuesday, December 17th appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: OFUG (Online FoxPro Users Group) Meeting Tonight
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
UPDATE: The meeting was recorded and is available on the OFUG YouTube Channel. Tonight’s presentation is “Update Me and My Licenses: License and Update Management for VFP” by Tuvia Vinitsky OFUG meets the 3rd Tuesday of each month at 8:30PM (Eastern Time – currently EDT). If you’re not sure what time that is in your time zone, you can […]

item.title: Speaking at DAFUG and DevCon
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ll be at the Detroit Area Fox Users Group meeting this Thursday night (February 8), talking about the Desktop Alerts. I’ve never been to Michigan, so I’m looking forward to the trip and meeting some new friends. I jokingly told the guys at the Chicago meeting last December that Chicago was the first stop on my 2007 ‘World Tour’ (I […]

item.title: Heading to the Windy City
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ll be presenting the Desktop Alerts session at the Chicago FoxPro User’s and Developers Group meeting on Tuesday, December 12, at 5:30PM (CST). I’m looking forward to the trip and meeting the fine folks in the Windy City. I’ve never been to Chicago (or Illinois, for that matter). I wonder if it’ll be cold up there? This […]
